title: Wounded But Not Broken
description: Love heals all wounds, but Veronica Ralston learns the hard way that it also creates them. A young widow at 42, sweet and influential Ronnie is content to spend her days sipping martinis and fundraising for charity, until a daring Texas Ranger and her brother-in-law unexpectedly begin clashing for her heart, both equally determined to prove to her that true love comes around more than once.
author: Janine Kane
